nodes.text: Hamogoni trees, native to the planet Woteba, were gigantic, often larger than skyscrapers. They had knee-roots around the size of a dewback, and enormous boughs like great green balconies. They were used as lumber by the Saras nest of Killiks when they occupied the planet. After the end of the Dark Nest Crisis, wood from a hamogoni tree wood be used in a desk in the Hapan Embassy on Coruscant in 40 ABY.
